member.name: O:Codeunit::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessagesActionHandler
member.summary: Exposes the functionality to handle recommended actions on the error messages page.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessagesActionHandler.OnActionDrillDown(Error Message@)
member.summary: Drill down to the recommended action of an error message to execute it with a confirmation dialog box.
member.param: Selected error message record is passed to get the action implementation properties and update the message status after executing the action.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessagesActionHandler.ExecuteActions(Error Message@)
member.summary: Execute recommended actions for all the selected error messages on the page.
member.param: Selected error messages are passed from the page to get the action implementation properties and update the message status for each message after executing the actions.

member.name: O:Interface::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessageFix
member.summary: An error message fix interface for setting additional properties and executing the fix from error message page.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessageFix.OnSetErrorMessageProps(Error Message@)
member.summary: Set error message properties like: title, caption, etc. It is primarily used to update fields in table extension 7900 "Error Message Ext."
member.param: Update the extended fields of the error message record.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessageFix.OnFixError(Error Message):Boolean
member.summary: Execute this procedure to fix the error. Return the execution status. If the error is fixed, the error message status will be set to Fixed and the OnSuccessMessage() will be shown. If the error is not fixed, the error message status will be set to Not Fixed.
member.param: The error message record provides the necessary information about the error to be able to fix it. This contains the context, source and the sub-context of the error message.
member.returns: True if the error is fixed. False if the error is not fixed.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Shared#Error#ErrorMessageFix.OnSuccessMessage:Text
member.summary: Show a acknowledgement message on successfully fixing the error. OnFixError and OnSuccessMessage are executed with the same instance of the interface. This means that the interface can store information from OnFixError() and use it in the OnSuccessMessage().
member.returns: The text message for showing it to the user.
